Dear Sir
I am using Tomcat 3.2.1 with apache.My adapter is mod_jk .This site is using 
the virtual hosting.I have add <host>tag in server.xml for this site.I am also 
using mysql with mm.mysql.jdbc1.2c with this.Now problem is thatthe servlet are 
running fine for one day.And than stop responding.Than i have to restart Tomcat 
and again it works fine for one day and stops.I am too fade up from this 
problem.Please help me regarding this.

Regards
Apurva Shah

There isn't enough information here to attempt to duplicate your problem, so I'm
resolving it as "invalid".  Please try a newer Tomcat, 3.2.2, 3.3, or 4.0, and
log a new bug if the problem is still present.

If the problem is still present, please include an example web application, or
as much detail as possible. Saying that Tomcat "stops responding" isn't enough
for us identify the problem.
